channel.title: KISS Linux Posts
channel.description: Blog posts and news about Kiss Linux and its development.

item.title: 20210829a
item.description: The baseinit package will be updated to make using other init systems, service managers and device managers easier than before (and to remove hardcoded assumptions (on busybox) or otherwise unconfigurable behavior). Also, the distribution will provide s6 and sinit as alternatives to busybox init.
